languages.text: "Увы, этого потребовала операция. Через агентов Эмелины, моего аколита, я вышел на связь с архонтом Иремерисс и заключил пакт. Я предоставил им доступ к технологиям, сокрытым в этой ксенореликвии, а также уничтожал конкурентов в ее кабале. Иремерисс передавала информацию об их рейдах моим шпионам, а я устранял проблему. А за это ее гемункул, Тервантьяс, ковал для меня Ярмо".

"Alas, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my acolytes, Emelina, I contacted Archon Yremeryss and made a pact. I gave her access to the technologies contained within this relic and destroyed her rivals in the Kabal — she would relay information on their raids to my spies, and I would solve the problem. In exchange, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."
languages.original_text: "Увы, этого потребовала операция. Через агентов Эмелины, моего аколита, я вышел на связь с архонтом Иремерисс и заключил пакт. Я предоставил им доступ к технологиям, сокрытым в этой ксенореликвии, а также уничтожал конкурентов в ее кабале. Иремерисс передавала информацию об их рейдах моим шпионам, а я устранял проблему. А за это ее гемункул, Тервантьяс, ковал для меня Ярмо".

traits.locale_text: "Sadly,, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my Acolytes,Emeline, I managed to get in touch with the Archon Yremeriss and made a pact. I gave them access to the technologies hidden inside the Shard and also destroyed the rivals in her Kabal. Yremeriss passed the information on their raids to my spies, and I got rid of the problem. In exchange for this, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Sadly,, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my Acolytes,Emeline, I managed to get in touch with the Archon Yremeriss and made a pact. I gave them access to the technologies hidden inside the Shard and also destroyed the rivals in her Kabal. Yremeriss passed the information on their raids to my spies, and I got rid of the problem. In exchange for this, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Sadly, the operation demanded it. Using the agents of one of my Acolytes, Emeline, I got in touch with the Archon Yremeriss and made a pact. I gave them access to the technologies hidden inside the Shard and was destroying the rivals in her Kabal. Yremeriss would relay the information on their raids to my spies and I would fix the problem. In exchange for this, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

I gave them access to the technologies hidden inside the Shard and was destroying the rivals in her Kabal. I gave her access to the technologies contained within this relic and destroyed her rivals in the Kabal — she would relay information on their raids to my spies, and I would solve the problem. traits.locale_text: "Alas, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my acolytes, Emelina, I contacted Archon Yremeryss and made a pact. I gave her access to the technologies contained within this relic and destroyed her rivals in the Kabal — she would relay information on their raids to my spies, and I would solve the problem. In exchange, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Malheureusement, l'opération l'exigeait. Grâce aux agents de l'une de mes acolytes, Emelina, j'ai pris contact avec l'archonte Yremeryss et nous avons conclu un pacte. Pour remplir ma part du marché, je lui ai donné accès aux technologies cachées dans cette relique et j'ai éliminé ses rivaux dans la Kabale. Yremeryss transmettait des informations sur leurs raids à mes espions et je résolvais le problème. En échange, son hémoncule, Tervantias, m'a forgé le Joug. »
languages.original_text: "Alas, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my acolytes, Emelina, I contacted Archon Yremeryss and made a pact. I gave her access to the technologies contained within this relic and destroyed her rivals in the Kabal — she would relay information on their raids to my spies, and I would solve the problem. In exchange, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, l'opération l'exigeait. Grâce aux agents d'une de mes acolytes, Emelina, j'ai pris contact avec l'archonte Yremeryss et nous avons conclu un pacte. Pour remplir ma part du marché, je leur ai donné accès aux technologies cachées dans l'Écharde et j'ai éliminé ses rivaux dans sa Kabale. Yremeryss transmettait des informations sur leurs raids à mes espions et je résolvais le problème. En échange, son hémoncule, Tervantias, m'a forgé le Joug. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Por desgracia, era necesario para la operación. A través de los agentes de una de mis acólitos, Emelina, contacté con la Arconte Yremeryss e hice un pacto. Le otorgué acceso a las tecnologías que contenía esta reliquia y destruí a sus rivales en la Kábala; filtraba información sobre sus asaltos a mis espías para que los aplastara. A cambio, su Hemónculo, Tervantias, forjó el Yugo para mí».
languages.original_text: "Alas, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my acolytes, Emelina, I contacted Archon Yremeryss and made a pact. I gave her access to the technologies contained within this relic and destroyed her rivals in the Kabal — she would relay information on their raids to my spies, and I would solve the problem. In exchange, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, la operación lo exigía. A través de los agentes de una de mis acólitos, Emeline, me puse en contacto con la Arconte Yremeriss y formé un pacto. Les proporcioné acceso a las tecnologías ocultas en el fragmento y aplastaba a sus rivales en la Kábala. Yremeriss filtraba la información de sus asaltos a mis espías y yo solucionaba el problema. A cambio, su Hemónculo, Tervantias, forjó el Yugo para mí».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “很遗憾，考虑到当时的情况，我不得不这么做。我通过我的侍仆艾米莉娜，与伊芮梅莉斯执政官取得了联系，达成了协议。我允许她接触这件圣物包含的技术，协助她消灭阴谋团的敌人。伊芮梅莉斯负责将黑暗灵族袭击的信息传达给我的情报网，由我来解决她的敌人。作为回报，她的血伶人特万提亚斯为我锻造了圣枷。”
languages.original_text: "Alas, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my acolytes, Emelina, I contacted Archon Yremeryss and made a pact. I gave her access to the technologies contained within this relic and destroyed her rivals in the Kabal — she would relay information on their raids to my spies, and I would solve the problem. In exchange, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，考虑到当时的情况，我不得不这么做。我通过我的侍仆艾米莉娜，与伊芮梅莉斯执政官取得了联系，达成了协议。我负责向他们提供隐藏在碎片之中的技术信息，协助他们消灭阴谋团的敌人。伊芮梅莉斯负责将黑暗灵族袭击的信息传达给我的情报网，由我来解决她的敌人。作为回报，她的血伶人特万提亚斯为我锻造了圣枷。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Leider hat die Operation es verlangt. Durch die Agenten meiner Akolythin Emelina habe ich Archontin Yremeryss kontaktiert und bin einen Pakt eingegangen. Ich habe ihr Zugang zu den Technologien in diesem Relikt gewährt und ihre Rivalen in der Kabale vernichtet — Yremeryss hat die Informationen zu ihren Angriffen an meine Spione weitergegeben und ich habe mich um das Problem gekümmert. Im Gegenzug hat ihr Haemonculus Tervantias für mich das Joch gefertigt."
languages.original_text: "Alas, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my acolytes, Emelina, I contacted Archon Yremeryss and made a pact. I gave her access to the technologies contained within this relic and destroyed her rivals in the Kabal — she would relay information on their raids to my spies, and I would solve the problem. In exchange, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."

traits.locale_text: "Bedauerlicherweise hat die Operation das erfordert. Über die Agenten meiner Akolythin Emelina habe ich Kontakt zu Archontin Yremeryss aufgenommen und bin einen Pakt mit ihr eingegangen. Ich habe ihnen Zugang zu den Technologien gewährt, die in dem Fragment versteckt waren, und habe die Rivalen in ihrer Kabale ausgeschaltet. Yremeryss hat die Informationen zu ihren Angriffen an meine Spione weitergegeben und ich habe mich um das Problem gekümmert. Im Gegenzug hat ihr Haemonculus Tervantias für mich das Joch erschaffen."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「悲しいかな、それは作戦に必要なことだった。アコライトの一人であるエメリナのエージェントを使い、アーコン・イレメリスと接触して協定を結んだ。彼らに遺物の中に隠された技術へのアクセス権を与え、彼女の陰謀団のライバルを打ち破った。彼女は襲撃情報を私のスパイに伝え、私が問題を解決する。これと引き換えに、彼女のハモンキュラスであるテルヴァンティアスは、私のためにヨークを作ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Alas, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my acolytes, Emelina, I contacted Archon Yremeryss and made a pact. I gave her access to the technologies contained within this relic and destroyed her rivals in the Kabal — she would relay information on their raids to my spies, and I would solve the problem. In exchange, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."

traits.locale_text: 「悲しいかな、それは作戦に必要なことだった。アコライトの一人であるエメリナのエージェントを使い、アーコン・イレメリスと接触して協定を結んだ。彼らに遺物の中に隠された技術へのアクセス権を与え、彼女の陰謀団のライバルを打ち破った。彼女は襲撃情報を私のスパイに伝え、私が問題を解決する。これと引き換えに、彼女のハモンキュラスであるテルヴァンティアスは、私のためにヨークを作ったのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Operasyon onu gerektiriyordu. Havarilerimden Emelina'nın ajanları üzerinden Arkon Yremeryss'e ulaştım ve bir anlaşma yaptım. Ona bu yadigârdaki teknolojilere erişim sağladım ve Kabal'daki rakiplerini yok ettim. Baskınlarında edindiği bilgileri ajanlarıma iletiyordu, ben de sorunu çözüyordum. Karşılığında Haimonkulus'u Tervantias, benim için Boyunduruk'u dövdü."
languages.original_text: "Alas, the operation demanded it. Through the agents of one of my acolytes, Emelina, I contacted Archon Yremeryss and made a pact. I gave her access to the technologies contained within this relic and destroyed her rivals in the Kabal — she would relay information on their raids to my spies, and I would solve the problem. In exchange, her Haemonculus, Tervantias, forged the Yoke for me."
